details.flavorText: Little more than a coiled mass of intestines encircling a massive gaping maw, this qlippoth is an Abyssal scavenger, subsisting on the filth and leftovers of demons and qlippoth alike, although it relishes any opportunity to consume living prey. Despite this seeming lowly role in the Abyssal ecosystem, a nyogoth is far from a stupid beast and can orchestrate cunning ambushes to secure its next meal.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You conjure a poisonous fog. This functions as obscuring mist, except the area moves 10 feet away from you each round. You deal 6d8 poison damage to each breathing creature that starts its turn in the spell's area. You can Dismiss the spell.

Heightened The damage increases by 1d8.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You conjure an arrow of acid that continues corroding the target after it hits. Make a spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal 3d8 acid damage plus 1d6 persistent acid damage. On a critical hit, double the initial damage, but not the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Damage}.

Heightened The initial damage increases by 2d8, and the persistent acid damage increases by 1d6.

description.label: Description
description.value:
Opening a door that bypasses normal space, you instantly transport yourself and any items you're wearing and holding from your current space to a clear space within range you can see. If this would bring another creature with you-even if you're carrying it in an extradimensional container-the spell is lost.

Heightened The range increases to 1 mile. You don't need to be able to see your destination, as long as you have been there in the past and know its relative location and distance from you. You are temporarily immune for 1 hour.

description.label: Description
description.value:
You plant fear in the target; it must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} 1.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} 2.

Critical Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} 3 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fleeing]{Fleeing} for 1 round.

Heightened You can target up to five creatures.
Trigger The nyogoth takes piercing or slashing damage; Effect The nyogoth sprays its acidic blood on adjacent creatures, dealing [[/r 6d6 # acid damage]] acid damage (DC 29 basic Reflex save).

Requirement The nyogoth has @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed} a creature; Effect The nyogoth slavers and chews at the grabbed creature, dealing 2d6+7 slashing and [[/r 1d6 # acid damage]] acid damage (DC 29 basic Fortitude save).

The nyogoth untangles its tentacles and prolapses its many mouths, turning itself inside out in a truly nauseating display. Creatures in a 30-foot emanation must attempt a DC 29 Will save, after which they are temporarily immune to further Nauseating Displays for 1 minute.
Critical Success The creature is unaffected.
Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened} 1.
Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned} 3 and sickened 1.
Critical Failure The creature is stunned 5 and sickened 2.
